dmca.title: Author of Glossary Alleges Infringement on Blogger Site
dmca.body:
To:	Blogger, DMCA complaints		
Fax:	[private]
From:	[private]	
Date:	10/04/2004
Re:	Copyright violation		
Pages:	1 (including cover)		1 (including cover)


The material contained on your website at: http://workers-compensation-insurance.blogspot.corn/ is an unauthorized use of copyrighted material from my company website. It appears to have been posted November 5, 2003. This Workers' Compensation glossary is a direct copy of the copyrighted glossary  that has been appearing on my website for the past several years (at least.)  I am the author of that glossary, and I have not authorized this use of my copyrighted material.

I have a good faith belief that we of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.  I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
